headline: Ball Closes Sale of 41% Interest in Saudi Arabia Joint Venture; Retains 10% Ownership Stake
summary: Ball Corporation (NYSE: BALL) today announced it has completed the sale of 41% of its 51% ownership interest in Ball United Arab Can Manufacturing Company (UAC), its consolidated joint venture in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, to a subsidiary of ORG Technology Co., Ltd. (ORG) for approximately USD $70 million, which is subject to customary closing adjustments. This transaction deepens the multi-year relationship with ORG and combines Ball's global can innovation and customer reach with ORG's regio
